metric.name: McCabe's Cyclomatic Complexity
metric.description: The number of flows through a piece of code. Each time a branch occurs (if, for, while, do, case, catch or ternary operators, as well as the && and || conditional logic operators in expressions) this metric is incremented by one.

metric.name: Number of Conditional Statements
metric.description: The number of if-else and case statements contained in the scoped element.

metric.name: Depth of Inheritance Tree
metric.description: The maximum distance from the class Object in the inheritance hierarchy for the scoped element.

metric.name: Lack of Cohesion in Methods (Chidamber and Kemerer)
metric.description: The number of pairs of methods in a class that don"t have at least one field in common minus the number of pairs of methods in the class that do share at least one field. When this value is negative, the metric value is set to 0.

metric.name: Lack of Cohesion in Methods
metric.description: The percentage of methods that do not access a specific attribute averaged over all attributes in the class.

metric.name: Lack of Cohesion in Methods (Henderson-Sellers)
metric.description: The total number of methods accessing a field of the class minus the total number of methods defined by the class divided through 1 minus the the total number of defined methods.

metric.name: Lines of Code
metric.description: The number of lines in the program"s source code representing the element.

metric.name: Lines of Code
metric.description: The number of lines in the program"s source code representing the element.

metric.name: Number of Abstract Methods
metric.description: The number of abstract methods contained in the scoped element.

metric.name: Nested Block Depth
metric.description: The depth of nested blocks of code.

metric.name: Number of Class Variables
metric.description: The number of class variables contained in the scoped element.

metric.name: Number of Invocations
metric.description: The number of invocations of the method.

metric.name: Number of inherited attributes
metric.description: The number of inherited attributes contained in the scoped element.

metric.name: Number of instance variables
metric.description: The number of instance variables contained in the scoped element.

metric.name: Number of Local Accesses
metric.description: The number of local accesses (from the defining type) to the attribute.

metric.name: Number of methods added
metric.description: The number of methods added contained in the scoped element.

metric.name: Number of methods extended
metric.description: The number of extended methods contained in the scoped element.

metric.name: Number of methods inherited
metric.description: The number of inherited methods contained in the scoped element.

metric.name: Number of Overridden Methods
metric.description: The number of overidden methods contained in the scoped element.

metric.name: Number of Attributes
metric.description: The number of attributes contained in the scoped element.

metric.name: Number of Children
metric.description: The number of direct subclasses of a class. A class implementing an interface counts as a direct child of that interface.

metric.name: Number of Classes
metric.description: The number of classes (and interfaces) contained in the scoped element.

metric.name: Number of Constructors
metric.description: The number of constructors contained in the scoped element.

metric.name: Number of Interfaces
metric.description: The number of interfaces contained in the scoped element.

metric.name: Number of Methods
metric.description: The number of methods contained in the scoped element.

metric.name: Number of Parameters
metric.description: The number of parameters of a method.

metric.name: Number of Statements
metric.description: The number of statements contained in the scoped element.

metric.name: Number of String Literals
metric.description: The number of String literals contained in the element.

metric.name: Number of Public Attributes
metric.description: The number of public attributes contained in the scoped element.

metric.name: Set Size
metric.description: The number of elements found in the set.

metric.name: Specialization Index
metric.description: The average of the specialization index, defined as NMO * DIT / NOM.

metric.name: Number of all descedant classes
metric.description: The number of all descedant classes contained in the scoped element.
